database.name: massive
database.description: The Massive Database contains information about all the proteomics/metabolomics datasets in massive

entry.name: PRIDE PXD000001 - TMT spikes
entry.description: Expected reporter ion ratios: Erwinia peptides: 1:1:1:1:1:1 Enolase spike (sp|P00924|ENO1_YEAST): 10:5:2.5:1:2.5:10 BSA spike (sp|P02769|ALBU_BOVIN): 1:2.5:5:10:5:1 PhosB spike (sp|P00489|PYGM_RABIT): 2:2:2:2:1:1 Cytochrome C spike (sp|P62894|CYC_BOVIN): 1:1:1:1:1:2

additional_fields.field: A protein modification that effectively replaces one hydrogen atom with a hydroxyl group.
A protein modification that effectively replaces a hydrogen atom with an methylsulfanyl group (thiomethyl group).
A protein modification that effectively replaces a hydrogen atom of a residue with the Proteome Sciences TMT6plex-126 reporter+balance group.
